definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Direct pressure should be kept on a wound for about twenty minutes.
sentences.chinese: 應該在傷口處施壓20分鐘左右。

sentences.english: The seer made no reply, and again and again Cao Cao pressed the question.
sentences.chinese: 先見沒有回答，並一再曹操施壓的問題。

sentences.english: Many Mongolians suspected a Chinese-style political squeeze.
sentences.chinese: 許多蒙古人懷疑這是中國式的政治施壓。

sentences.english: The FCCC also said the government engaged in intimidation.
sentences.chinese: 位於中國的外國記者俱樂部也說政府與施壓有關。

sentences.english: He failed to finish the plan, so they placed great pressure on him to ask for his cards.
sentences.chinese: 他沒完成計劃，因此他們對他大施壓力要求他辭職。

sentences.english: Why America places so much pressure on RMB?
sentences.chinese: 美國爲什麼總是向人民幣施壓？

sentences.english: Instead, put another clots ( cloth ) on top and continue pressure.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，再放一塊布在上面並繼續施壓。

sentences.english: Tightening the screws too far risks goading Mr Kim to strike back.
sentences.chinese: 施壓過大的危險在於可能驅使金正日反擊。

sentences.english: Because no tool pressures are involved, the process is ideal for machining delicate workpiece.
sentences.chinese: 由於刀具不施壓力，因而是切削易碎材料的理想工藝。

sentences.english: Reports of such pressure emerged immediately after Chen's election in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年陳當選後，施壓的報導立即浮現。

sentences.english: Eastern nations are thus pressured to upgrade their own fleets to maintain parity.
sentences.chinese: 東歐國家不斷施壓，升級自己的機羣從而保持均衡。

sentences.english: Downswings are especially difficult to recover from because there are multiple forces working against you.
sentences.chinese: 下風期極難恢復，因爲有多種力量對你施壓。

sentences.english: The disembodied hand renewed its pressure on his right shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 那隻遊魂手在他的右肩上重新施壓。

sentences.english: The world is in a situation akin to sitting at the fault line between two tectonic plates straining against each other.
sentences.chinese: 當今世界處於一種兩陣對壘極度向對方施壓的局面。

sentences.english: If your opponent is in your base, you need to apply quick pressure and build Fanatics .
sentences.chinese: 如果你的對手在你的基地裏，你需要快速施壓造狂徒。

sentences.english: These and other soft power ploys have worked in tandem with political arm-twisting.
sentences.chinese: 在這些軟實力技術運作同時，伴之以政治施壓。

definition: to demand payment of money owing
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
